title: Can we opt for 2 graduation degree courses at a time, one from regular mode (MU) and other from distance mode (IGNOU)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes there is no trouble doing two courses at the same time if you can manage your studies perfectly it can do no damage to your career. Be careful as not to indulge deeply into the ignou course as B.E is your first priority and you need to focus more on that, later you can shift your interest slowly towards your upsc preparation.
